name: Lords of Sword: Wild Hunt
description:
Warning! English translation is work in progress. You are download early-access beta game. Thank you!

Game Info:
Endless bloody battles for the title of Lord Blade await you. Equip your hero and fight!

Achieve success by fighting with mutants and other players in dynamic turn-based battles, pump your character and discover the amazing and dangerous world of Aurion.

At your disposal will be available a flexible system for pumping the character and game items, epic PVP-battles, tracking down dangerous creatures and much more is already waiting for you in the game!

Game Features:
- Fight for the title of Lord Blade in exciting PVP battles.
- Defeat dangerous creatures and mutants
- Join the clans and unite for the battle for Eurion!
- Improve your hero, pump his skills and learn magic
- Outfit your character and give it a unique look!
- Take with you to fight unique pets!

System Requirements:
- Mobile phone based on Android 4.4+ with a RAM capacity of at least 1GB.
- Permanent connection to the Internet
